name: Asteroid Hunter (itch) (Konstantin Kanev)
description:
•       Challenge based, space combat flight simulator.

•       Outer Space, Dark and cold portraying feelings of loneliness while flying around the vast emptiness of space.

•       Arcade gameplay and objective allows for a fun and less challenging concept when compared to games such as Star Citizen and Freelancer which involve deeper flight simulation and add aspects of space trading and FPS combat.

•       The aim is for the player to shootdown as many asteroids as possible before the time runs out to be able to progress to the next level and ultimately finish the game.

•       Game is set exclusively in space far away from any planets or systems, it is the rangers job to cut down the amount of asteroids free floating in the cosmos.
